director.name: 迈克尔·麦格隆 Michael McGlone

introduction: Season 1, Episode 1: The Washington SniperOriginal Air Date—9 November 2009In October, 2002, the people of the Washington, DC, area are in the grip of terror. A sniper is killing innocent and random victims and investigators seem to be chasing a ghost - the killer is mobile, and there might be more than one.Season 1, Episode 2: BTKOriginal Air Date—27 August 2010Season 1, Episode 3: Green River KillerOriginal Air Date—26 June 2010
